name: Soulnoyds-Into the magniverse
description:
Instructions -

1. Use the magnetic powers of Posso and Neggo to overcome obstacles in both universes.

Posso has the power to repel objects. (Push Power)

Neggo has the power to attract object. (Pull Power)

Move faster to break away from the objects connected by the magnetic force.

2. Phase Shift Energy (PSE) shifts the universe and makes the parallel universe active. The powers of the Souldnoyd in the active universe will be mirrored by the Souldnoyd in the inactive universe.
